There are many brands and forms of topical emollients available and not all are listed on this leaflet. Topical emollients may also be used for purposes not listed in this medication guide.

brandnames: Amlactin, Geri-Hydrolac, Kerasal AL, Lac-Hydrin, Laclotion
drug_generalinfo: Ammonium lactate is used to treat dry, scaly, itchy skin. Ammonium lactate may also be used for purposes not listed in this medication guide.

brandnames: Amlactin, Geri-Hydrolac, Kerasal AL, Lac-Hydrin, Laclotion
drug_generalinfo: Ammonium lactate is used to treat dry, scaly, itchy skin. Ammonium lactate may also be used for purposes not listed in this medication guide.

brandnames:
Generic Name: lactic acid (LACK-tick ASS-id)
Brand Name: Examples include AmLactin and Lac-Hydrin
drug_generalinfo: AmLactin cream is a humectant. Exactly how it works is unknown but it increases the amount of water in the skin, making it softer and more pliable.

brandnames:
Generic Name: lactic acid (LACK-tick ASS-id)
Brand Name: Examples include Lac-Hydrin and Lactinol
drug_generalinfo: Lactinol lotion is a humectant. Exactly how it works is unknown but it increases the amount of water in the skin, making it softer and more pliable.

brandnames:
Generic Name: lactic acid with vitamin e (LACK-tick AS-id/VYE-tah-min)
Brand Name: Generic only. No brands available.
drug_generalinfo: Lactinol-E is a humectant. Exactly how it works is unknown but it increases the amount of water in the skin, making it softer and more pliable. Vitamin E helps control dry or chapped skin.

brandnames: HPA Lanolin, Lanolor Cream, Lan-O-Soothe, Lansinoh for Breast Feeding Mothers, Tender Care
drug_generalinfo: Lanolin topical (for the skin) is used to treat or prevent dry skin, itching or other skin irritation caused by conditions such as diaper rash, radiation therapy skin burns, and others. Lanolin topical is also used to treat sore and cracked nipples caused by breast-feeding. Lanolin topical may also be used for purposes not listed in this medication guide.

brandnames:
Generic Name: kinetin (KIN-uh-tin)
Brand Name: Kinerase
drug_generalinfo: Kinerase cream is a moisturizing agent. It works by moisturizing the skin.

brandnames:
Generic Name: urea in lactic acid (ue-REE-a/LAK-tik AS-id)
Brand Name: Hydro 35
drug_generalinfo: Hydro 35 foam is a keratolytic. It works by helping the breakdown of dead skin, which helps to loosen and shed hard and scaly skin. It also softens and moisturizes the skin.

brandnames:
Generic Name: pilocarpine (pye-loe-KAR-peen)
Brand Name: Salagen
drug_generalinfo: Pilocarpine is a cholinergic agent. It works by increasing the secretion of saliva from the salivary glands, which helps to relieve dry mouth.

brandnames:
Generic Name: pilocarpine (pye-loe-KAR-peen)
Brand Name: Salagen
drug_generalinfo: Salagen is a cholinergic agent. It works by increasing the secretion of saliva from the salivary glands, which helps to relieve dry mouth.

brandnames:
Generic Name: artificial saliva (ahr-tuh-FISH-uhl suh-LYE-vah)
Brand Name: NeutraSal
drug_generalinfo: NeutraSal powder is an artificial saliva. It works by moistening and lubricating the mouth and throat.

brandnames:
Generic Name: artificial saliva
Brand Name: Aquoral
drug_generalinfo: Salivart spray is an artificial saliva. It works by moistening and lubricating the mouth and throat.

Generic Name: artificial saliva
Brand Name: Caphosol
